Detailed Description

mental ray C++ shader interface extensions.

This file provides interfaces that allow interaction with frame buffers.

shader_framebuffer.h is included by mi_shader_if.h, which in turn is included from shader.h if the shader is compiled as C++ code. A shader does not need to include this file directly.
